title: Sweet Mountain Magic
description: RAPTURE IN THE ROCKIESSage MacKenzie had been alone in the mountains too long when he came upon the gorgeous woman who claimed she'd lost her memory. Even though she gazed at him through innocent violet eyes, he convinced himself that no decent lady would be wandering by herself deep in the forest. Delighting in her curvaceous form, Sage had his way with her only to discover he couldn't let her go. Soon he wanted the good-loving beauty to share his future and he desperately prayed she wouldn't leave him once she remembered her past.PASSION IN HER HEARTOnce she was rescued by the tall, black-haired trapper, the white girl known only as "White Deer" didn't want to regain her memory. She knew it must be horrible if she had so thoroughly blocked it out. Here was a man who'd saved her from vicious Indians, the cruel elements and wild animals now all that mattered was the present. Even though deep down she suspected that loving Sage was wrong, the mysterious woman embraced him even tighter, living only for his gentle touch and his overpowering SWEET MOUNTAIN MAGIC.
author: Rosanne Bittner
